    R

    Rectangle - Class in Unnamed Package
    class that represents rectangles it has width and height
    Rectangle() - Constructor for class Rectangle
    parameterless constructor is needed for children`s classes
    Rectangle(int, int) - Constructor for class Rectangle
    default constructor to create rectangle
    RectangleAdapter - Class in Unnamed Package
    Class to present other figures as rectangles
    RectangleAdapter(Polygon) - Constructor for class RectangleAdapter
    Overloading constructor that converts polygon to rectangle It is achieved by setting sides to 4 and getting width and height from radius by formula
    RectangleAdapter(RoundedRectangle) - Constructor for class RectangleAdapter
    Overloading constructor that converts roundedRectangle to rectangle It is achieved by setting corner radius to 0
    RoundedRectangle - Class in Unnamed Package
    class that represents rectangles with rounded corners it has width and height and corner radius
    RoundedRectangle(int, int, int) - Constructor for class RoundedRectangle
    default constructor to create rounded rectangle
